artist: Artist: Count Anton-Maria Zanetti the Elder; Artist: after Raphael (Raffaello Sanzio)
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: man reclining on a bed with a youth facing him in the foreground; woman and youth to the R under an arch
medium: Chiaroscuro woodcut from three color blocks and a key block
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed in block, upper right: [Ex Raph Vrbinat]; dated in block, lower left: [1741] and surmounted by monogram: [AMZ]
title: Isaac Blessing Esau
